webtoolsmanager-desc: A MediaWiki extension that provides an interactive UI for web tool management for wikis, like Open Graph, analytics, etc.
webtoolsmanager-error-nopermission: {{GENDER:$1|You}} do not have permission to access this page.
webtoolsmanager-form-analytics-google-id: The ID for this tracking project. Leave blank to not use Google Analytics at all.
Given ID is malformed. Please use a correct Google Analytics ID
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-fallbackO: If no image is found in an article, fall back on the wiki logo for the `image` meta tag
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-descripti: Description that will appear in the summary tags for the main page, and any page that has no summary on its own. Leave empty for no description.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-twitter-c: Twitter handle for the creator or owner of the wiki
